Translations.Text: My have sent do Thamoud ich brat Saaleh saying Ona kult GOD they turned into 2 feuding factions
He said O moj ludia ona hasten robit commit zly dobry robota? Len ona implore GOD forgiveness ona attain zlutovanie
They said My consider ona zly omen us ona those joined ona. He said Tvoj omen fully controlled GOD Indeed ona bol deviant ludia
There bol 9 gangsters mesto bol zlomyselny never robi anything dobry
They said swear GOD my kill him jeho ludia potom tell jeho tribe â€˜My zauzlit nothing ich smrt! My bol truthful
They zapletka kut plany my i zapletka kut plany chvila they nie zbadat
Note consequences ich zapletka my annihilated them all ich ludia
Tu som ich domov utterly zahuba ich transgression! This bol lekcia ludia zauzlit
My save those verit lead righteous zivot
Lot said do jeho ludia Ako ona commit such abomination publicly chvila ona see
Ona practice rod clovek lustfully zensky! Indeed ona bol ignorant ludia
